channel.title: Portfolio website for Catherine(Zihan) Xu
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio website for Catherine(Zihan) Xu

item.title: Analysis about drinks
item.description: Where Do People Drink The Most Beer, Wine And Spirits? Back in 2014, fivethiryeight.com published an article on alcohol consumption in different countries. The data drinks is available as part of the fivethirtyeight package. The data is downloaded and stored in the dataset alcohol_direct library(fivethirtyeight) data(drinks) After saving the data, is important to understand the number of variables and their type (e.g. string, double, integer). Hence, we use the functions glimpse and skim.

item.title: GDP component and proportion comparison
item.description: GDP components over time and among countries At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports). You can read more about GDP and the different approaches in calculating at the Wikipedia GDP page. The GDP data we will look at is from the United Nations’ National Accounts Main Aggregates Database, which contains estimates of total GDP and its components for all countries from 1970 to today.

item.title: General Social Survey (GSS)
item.description: General Social Survey (GSS) The General Social Survey (GSS) gathers data on American society in order to monitor and explain trends in attitudes, behaviours, and attributes. Many trends have been tracked for decades, so one can see the evolution of attitudes, etc in American Society. gss <- read_csv(here::here("data", "smallgss2016.csv"), na = c("", "Don't know", "No answer", "Not applicable")) glimpse(gss) ## Rows: 2,867 ## Columns: 7 ## $ emailmin <chr> "0", "30", "NA", "10", "NA", "0", "0", "NA", "0", "NA", "0.

item.title: Who is Catherine?
item.description: Self-Introduction of Zihan Xu photo of Zihan Xu & her friends Name: Zihan Xu English name: Catherine Double Masters’ Program: Master in Financial Analysis of LBS & Master in Finance of Fudan University Graduate University: Sichuan University Major: Accounting Nationality: China Hobbies: Singing, Dancing, Traveling, Crux Play Favorite food: Hotpot, Cheese Cake Constellation: Libra

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
